title: Speed your migration to JBoss EAP 8 with Windup
content: Windup is a set of tools that support the migration and modernization of Java applications by producing detailed code analysis, effort estimation and migration steps. In this article, we will show how to produce a migration report for a JBoss EAP 7 application that we want to move to JBoss EAP 8. Windup Overview Windup ...  The post appeared first on .
